text: Jason Drew Harrow (born May 12, 1976), better known by his stage name Kardinal Offishall is a Canadian rapper, record producer, DJ, and record executive. Offishall has won many awards including 3 Juno Awards, 4 MuchMusic Video Awards, 3 SOCAN Awards and 1 Canadian Urban Music Award. ==Discography== Kardinal Offishall has released 5 studio albums and 1 EP: ===Albums=== Year Album 1997 Eye & I 2001 Quest for Fire: Firestarter, Vol. 1 2005 Fire and Glory 2008 Not 4 Sale 2010 Mr. International ===EP's=== Year Album 2000 Husslin' ==References== ==Other websites== *Kardinal Offisha's Official website Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Ontario Category:Canadian rappers Category:Canadian record producers
title: Kardinal Offishall
